---
name: Comprehensive Documentation
about: Create complete documentation for users, developers, and API consumers
title: '[DOCUMENTATION] Comprehensive Documentation'
labels: ['documentation']
assignees: []
---

## Feature Description
Create comprehensive documentation covering user guides, API documentation, developer setup, and contribution guidelines.

## User Story
As a user/developer, I want clear documentation so that I can understand how to use the application and contribute to the project.

## Requirements

### User Documentation
- [ ] Create user guide with screenshots
- [ ] Write getting started tutorial
- [ ] Document all features with examples
- [ ] Create FAQ section
- [ ] Add troubleshooting guide
- [ ] Write mobile app usage guide
- [ ] Create video tutorials (optional)

### API Documentation
- [ ] Document all REST endpoints
- [ ] Add request/response examples
- [ ] Document authentication flows
- [ ] Create API versioning documentation
- [ ] Add error codes reference
- [ ] Generate OpenAPI/Swagger specification
- [ ] Set up interactive API documentation (Swagger UI)

### Developer Documentation
- [ ] Improve README with detailed setup
- [ ] Create CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
- [ ] Document architecture and design decisions
- [ ] Create database schema documentation
- [ ] Add coding standards and style guide
- [ ] Document testing strategy
- [ ] Create deployment guide

### Code Documentation
- [ ] Add JSDoc comments to React components
- [ ] Add JavaDoc to backend classes
- [ ] Document complex algorithms
- [ ] Add inline comments for tricky code
- [ ] Create component storybook (optional)

### Project Management
- [ ] Create issue templates (in progress)
- [ ] Add pull request template
- [ ] Document branching strategy
- [ ] Create release process documentation
- [ ] Add roadmap document

## Acceptance Criteria
- All features documented with examples
- API documentation is complete and accurate
- New developers can set up project using docs
- User guide covers common workflows
- Documentation is easy to navigate
- Code has appropriate comments
- Contribution process is clear

## Dependencies
- None (but benefits from other features being complete)

## Technical Notes
- Consider using documentation generators (JSDoc, JavaDoc, Swagger)
- Host documentation on GitHub Pages or dedicated site
- Keep documentation in version control
- Use Markdown for easy editing
- Include diagrams where helpful (Mermaid, PlantUML)
- Add version numbers to documentation
